title: Three Hours of Terror in Paris, Moment by Moment
body:
1Around 9:40, a black Volkswagen Polo parked on the street outside the Bataclan, and three men with assault rifles entered the music club.

2With shouts of “Allahu akbar,” the men emerged into the club’s two-story ballroom. Prosecutors said their shouts also included references to Iraq and Syria.

The attackers fanned out around the darkened hall, throwing grenades and shooting into the crowd.
summary: 1Around 9:40, a black Volkswagen Polo parked on the street outside the Bataclan, and three men with assault rifles entered the music club.2With shouts of “Allahu akbar,” the men emerged into the club’s two-story ballroom.Prosecutors said their shouts also included references to Iraq and Syria.The attackers fanned out around the darkened hall, throwing grenades and shooting into the crowd.
